extends java.lang.Object

Encapsulates a KDX collection manager.

Method Detail

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
This returns all of the collections, as required by the KDX collections.json file. This file should be copied (or replace) collections.json file in system/ directory of KDX mount.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
a JSON string.
See Also:
Collection, Checksum

Returns:
a JSON string in KDX collections format.
